title: 360° VR-Based Immersive Science Education Design and Implementation

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate theoretical knowledge in the relevant scientific field and basic digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: Course for Medical/Legal/Technical Professionals to Create and Utilize 360° VR Content for Scientific Problem-Solving, Conducted in Environments Supported by Digital Devices (Tablets, VR Headsets, etc.)

learning_goals: Learners can create immersive content replicating scientific experiment processes using 360° VR production tools.
Learners can add interactive elements (questions, annotations) to VR content and structure it according to educational objectives.
Learners can apply 360° VR technology to real-world scientific problem-solving scenarios through PBL team activities.

resources: 360° Camera and VR Equipment Rental System

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
